participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and easy-going, Alex enjoys trying new things and has a passion for cooking.
participant_1.background: I like to watch talk shows and sitcoms while I drink my coffee. I decided to move to Salt Lake City to be with my girlfriend. I work as a chef and love to come up with creative ways to use kale in my dishes. My favorite band is Hop Along. I once got food poisoning from a cheeseburger at a diner in the Midwest.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and hands-on, Jordan enjoys outdoor activities and has a strong appreciation for the arts.
participant_2.background: I love to weld and rock climb! I drink milk to help me digest my large meals. I enjoy jazz music. I remember visiting the petting zoo with my parents and brother when I was a kid. I enjoy strong female characters in my movies.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! What about you?
I'm doing well, too! I'm just hanging out and watching some TV.
Sounds relaxing. I'm currently welding a project for my brother.
That's awesome! I love welding. I used to do it a lot in high school.
That's cool! I've only been doing it for a few years, but I love it.
I'm making a shelf for my brother's new apartment.
That's awesome! I'm sure he'll love it.
So, what else do you like to do?
I love to rock climb! I've been doing it for about 5 years now.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to try rock climbing, but I'm too afraid of heights.
It's definitely scary at first, but you get used to it.
I'm sure I would. I'm just not sure I could ever get over my fear of heights.
You should try it sometime! It's a lot of fun.
I might just have to do that!
Great! I'm sure you'll love it.
